allow:
Bash(echo "# Bluesky Branding Removal Checklist

## 1. App Icons & Images
- assets/app-icons/*.png - App icons (replace with Aurora Prism branding)
- assets/favicon.png - Browser favicon
- assets/icon-android-*.png - Android icons
- assets/default-avatar.png - Default avatar image

## 2. App Metadata
- app.json - App name, slug, description
- package.json - App name and description

## 3. Text References (276 occurrences)
- Onboarding screens (src/screens/Onboarding/)
- Signup screens (src/screens/Signup/)
- Settings/About screens
- Terms of Service / Privacy Policy references
- Help text and tooltips
- Error messages mentioning Bluesky

## 4. URLs
- bsky.app references (feed URLs, profile URLs)
- bsky.social references
- Links to Bluesky support/help

## 5. Service Names
- Bluesky Moderation Service references
- Default feed generator names

Total: 276 text references found")

Bash(psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as users,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM posts) as posts,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes) as likes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reposts) as reposts,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows) as follows,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blocks) as blocks;")
